entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Hamilton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:51 AM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 08:00 AM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -8.2°C
Wind: N 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount possibly reaching 10 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
